data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
CodeKit is primarily an extension of DBI, although it has HTML and
    CGI components. I vote for placing it under DBIx where the database
    design and programming folks will see it.

    This is called "CodeKit" because it takes care of all of your
    database code table programming for you.

    Hence DBIx::CodeKit
